experiences.description: Implemented a blockchain-enabled Flutter app for secure book lending and transfer using Solana unique id. Developed a cutting-edge Flutter app integrating blockchain and Firebase for local book lending/borrowing, resulting in 100+ TestFlight downloads and a thriving community of over 1000+ engaged members.

Contributed to the App - MeetOwner with a potential team of 4 members. Created and launched a property listing and purchasing application, achieving 10+ trial downloads and overseeing a database of 100+ properties, demonstrating adept software engineering and project coordination.
